content.description: A one-sample <math alttext="z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>z</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-test for a proportion at the significance level of <math alttext="alpha equals 0.10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Î±</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> will be conducted for the following set of hypotheses. <math alttext="The null hypothesis is p equals 0.50 and the alternative hypothesis is p is less than 0.50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mi>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.50</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><mi>p</mi><mo><</mo><mn>0.50</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>
content.question: For which of the following is the probability of a Type <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>II</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> error the greatest?

choices.label: A sample size of <math alttext="200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.45" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.45</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A sample size of <math alttext="200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.40" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.40</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A sample size of <math alttext="200" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.35" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.35</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A sample size of <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.45" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.45</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

A sample size of <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.35" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.35</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: A sample size of <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and a true proportion of <math alttext="0.45" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.45</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
